attributes.action: Enforce the NMC to pay students during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair that student nurses and midwives are going to be used to work for free in an overwhelmed NHS
attributes.background: Enforce the Nursing and Midwifery Council (NMC) to reintroduce the emergency standards, allowing student nurses and midwives to get paid.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555178
